{"id":1138612017,"question_id":3236,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1704554636,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1138612017/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Missing Integer Greater Than Sequential Prefix Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\n    public int missingInteger(int[] nums) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        Set<Integer> set = new HashSet<>();\n        for(int n : nums){\n            set.add(n);\n        }\n        // int res = Integer.MAX_VALUE;\n//         \n        int longest = 1;\n        int prefix = nums[0];\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            \n           \n            int j = i;\n            int cur = nums[j];\n            \n            while(j+1<len && nums[j+1]==nums[j]+1){\n               \n                cur += nums[j+1];\n                 j++;\n            }\n            \n            if(j-i+1>longest && prefix < cur){\n                longest = j-i+1;\n                prefix = cur;\n            }\n            \n        }\n        // System.out.println(longest+ \" \" + prefix);\n        \n        while(set.contains(prefix)){\n            prefix ++;\n        }\n        \n        return prefix;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-missing-integer-greater-than-sequential-prefix-sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
